messages.msgSnippet: thanks for nobody correcting my spelling or typos or GRAMMAR (i won spelling bees in school)~ I LET IT ALL LOOSE ON THE EMAIL~~~~~~its the one place in my life
messages.messageBody:
thanks for nobody correcting my spelling or typos or GRAMMAR (i won spelling
bees in school)~ I LET IT ALL LOOSE ON THE EMAIL~~~~~~its the one place in
